metadata.title: CVE-2021-47611 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mac80211: validate extended element ID is presentBefore attempting to parse an extended element, verify thatthe extended element ID is present.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
